blog.name: swpromptsandasks
blog.title: StarWars prompts and asks
blog.description: Send me your best (weird, nsfw and cute) prompts and asks for Star wars and if they contain Obi-Wan then hurray for me. Lets see what we can drum up. (I don't write for the last trilogy, apologies)

summary: Another Qui/Obi fanfic question: tea is ubiquitous in Jedi fanfic and especially  in Qui/Obi fic. Does this have a canon/legends...
question: Another Qui/Obi fanfic question: tea is ubiquitous in Jedi fanfic and especially  in Qui/Obi fic. Does this have a canon/legends source (aside from Jude Watson's  2005 Secrets of the Jedi), or is this a delightful innovation of fanon?
answer:
Okay, don’t quote me on this but as far as I know its a mix of both canon and fanon because I think when Tahl died in the Jedi apprentice series when Obi-Wan was still a young padawan, Obi-Wan spent a full month brewing tea for Qui-Gon and setting the cups quietly in front of him as a way to help him heal?

Just a constant presence of quiet comfort?

But don’t quote me on this.

And after that I think the fan base just picked up on those two adoring well brewed tea and using it as a thing between them since well brewed tea is an artform and I know I love a good cup myself.

Though maybe someone with more star wars fandom tenure than me can answer this question better lol but this is my understanding at least.

title: Market Bound
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2JGMLko

by I_Gave_You_Fair_Warning

Anakin is in the Market to find a slave. Obi-Wan, slave of the Marketplace, keeps seeking the right master. His prior masters Qui-Gon (who became both father and teacher) and Satine (who became lover and lifemate) are both dead.

Anakin doesn’t even know he is attempting to follow such tough acts.

Words: 2932, Chapters: 1/3, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars - All Media Types, Star Wars Prequel Trilogy, The Marketplace Series - Laura Antoniou
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Anakin Skywalker | Darth Vader, Obi-Wan Kenobi
  • Relationships: Obi-Wan Kenobi/Anakin Skywalker
  • Additional Tags: It’s a Marketplace AU, That Means Explicit Erotica, fantasy kink, Consensual Slavery, Slave Contracts, Slave auctions, Slave Master Anakin, Slave Obi-Wan, Bisexual Anakin, Demisexual Anakin, Past Padmé Amidala/Anakin Skywalker, Past Obi-Wan Kenobi/Satine Kryze, Submissive Obi-Wan Kenobi, Explicit Sexual Content, Real(ish) World AU

summary: Article 13… the death of the internet
title: Article 13… the death of the internet
body:
In this post I‘m going to talk a bit more about Article 13, an article which will be the downfall of many creators on social media.

First of all I‘m going to explain what this article is and what it means, and after that I‘m going to explain why this means that many social media accounts on twitter, Instagram, Tumblr and Youtube will be deleted.

1. What is „Article 13“

The EU passed Article 13 which says that EVERY social media platform will be legally responsible for every Copyright infringement.

That means: If you post videos on YouTube or Gif sets on Tumblr which contain footage of movies or TV shows you are not the one who will get sued. Instead the social media platforms will be responsible for that.

2. Why your accounts will get deleted?

Because all those platforms simply don’t want to get sued because of copyright issues, they are going to delet every account or channel which uploads copyrighted content.

This includes:

  • Gif sets
  • Fanfics
  • YouTube videos
  • Quotes
  • Memes
  • Videos with music in the background
  • Quotes
  • Gaming videos
  • Reaction videos
  • And a lot more…

Social media platforms don’t want to risk to pay billions of dollars because of Copyright issues, so they will simply delet european accounts.

As an European you won’t be able to watch your favorite YouTuber anymore, read your favorite Fanfic or create gif sets.

In a few month there will be one last vote by the EU and this will shape the future of the internet and we need to do something!

3. What can you do?

  • Sign this petition
  • Spread the hashtag #saveyourinternet
  • Inform others about this
  • Write an email to members of the European Parliament

summary: Purple star twilek by ignoreit  “W.I.P. Hopefully will be done by the weekend :3 I Also I totes need to fix the lekku and put in...
caption:
Purple star twilek by ignoreit

“W.I.P.
Hopefully will be done by the weekend :3

I Also I totes need to fix the lekku and put in a better variety of shades in her skin tone. also the eyes are too muted so I will work on that as well. And then, obviously, there are unpainted parts XD. Also, I learned I cant paint clouds worth POOOooop.

Oils on canvas paper. time so far : 5 hours. (mostly cause i waste time by blending and reblending and reblending. ANS THEN ITS ALL ONE COLOR AND I HAVE TO START ALL OVER /sob/)“


Please visit the artist’s DeviantArt pages and her Tumblr blog @nutnuhmellaarts

blog.name: case-of-the-strange
blog.title:
Mostly Star Wars
(also some shitposts)
blog.description: “You don’t want to follow this blog. You want to go home and rethink your life.”- Obi Wan Kenobi | 20 | She/Her/Her's |

tags: yeah im pretty happy with this
other takes on this concept are VERY welcome
bc it’s a very cool idea and i want to see how other people would visualize it
summary: I don’t mean dying, I mean death personified. Because nearly every culture on earth has a personification of death in their...
body:
What do the clones think of death?

I don’t mean dying, I mean death personified. Because nearly every culture on earth has a personification of death in their folklore somewhere, and it made me wonder how the clones would imagine death. The most common take is that they follow the mandalorian views on death, that when someone dies they will join the manda, and that the dead are “Not gone, merely marching far away.” I don’t refute that, I think it’s a very good take. But I think especially for the younger clones, the views would be slightly different due to the circumstances they live in. Mandalorians are proud warriors, but they’re usually not just fighting droids, and if they really wanted to they could surrender or not fight. The clones must fight the droids, so I thought their death figure might be very droid like.

So I’m neither an artist nor an engineer, but I really liked this idea and wanted it get it on paper. I imagined some amalgamation of a skeleton and a droid, with the chest and rib cage being made up of motors. The head is meant to be a take on the classic hooded death, although I’m not sure what metal it would be made out of to wrinkle like that.

I don’t know whether the clones would view it as an evil of benevolent figure. It would probably vary from clone to clone. And I don’t think they’d believe in it literally, it’s just a neat bit of poetic visualization, much like how death is viewed today. Still, if the dead are marching far away, there’s got to be something leading them right?

blog.name: monnibor
blog.title: My tiny pond
blog.description: Translator student, artist, writer, crafter and a mess who gets too excited about new things too quickly.

summary:
Chapter 33 is a strategy waiting to happen.

 Be My Prize Poe Dameron/Kylo Ren, Poe Dameron/Finn Poe Dameron is forced to take a...
body:
Chapter 33 is a strategy waiting to happen.

Be My Prize

Poe Dameron/Kylo Ren, Poe Dameron/Finn

Poe Dameron is forced to take a vacation and has to leave the Resistance base, and he is not exactly thrilled about it. He soon meets a stranger, who is the definition of “tall, dark, and handsome”, and they are both fascinated with each other. The vacation is suddenly starting to seem less and less like a bore.

However, things can only go downhill from here, when one of the interested parties is a Resistance pilot and the other hails the flag of the First Order.

—

The story starts before the events of The Force Awakens and continues past the the movie.

The fic will update every Saturday until I run out of my buffer, though I will attempt to continue the weekly schedule even after that happens.

summary: I’m not white and I don’t live in a basement
title: I’m not white and I don’t live in a basement
body:
I’m just sick and tired of the crap that Disney and Lucasfilm are throwing at us Star Wars fans.  After The Last Jedi, I was sick and tired of the way that Lucasfilm was treating the original characters that I’ve grown up with.  After killing off Han unceremoniously, they emasculate Luke then have him killed off. Carrie Fisher died so she didn’t get the ignominious send-off, so they decided to bring in Lando Calrissian (guess they’ll kill HIM off for the last episode).  Tell you this much, I’m done. 

So call me racist if you want.  You can call me an Asian Uncle Tom, but I applauded Kelly Marie Tran when she got the role but I just hated the way her character was written into the story - she had ZERO character development.  I don’t like the way Rey was written - She’s written as if she’s invincible.  Where the hell was her “Oh shit, I fucked up…moment.” She hasn’t had one.  Yeah, Luke had one…it was when he faced off against Darth Vader at Bespin minus a hand with the tip of that red lightsaber of Darth Vader’s aimed at his throat.  Holdo’s character was completely useless.  This was a complete fuck-up from start to finish.

But you guys are going to whine and cry that “Oh…he doesn’t like Kelly Marie Tran’s character; He’s RAAACIST…  Yeah, OK…whatever.  Kiss my ass.

I’m just sick and tired of the crap that Disney and Lucasfilm are throwing at us Star Wars fans.  After The Last Jedi, I was sick and tired of the way that Lucasfilm was treating the original characters that I’ve grown up with.  After killing off Han unceremoniously, they emasculate Luke then have him killed off. Carrie Fisher died so she didn’t get the ignominious send-off, so they decided to bring in Lando Calrissian (guess they’ll kill HIM off for the last episode).  Tell you this much, I’m done. 

So call me racist if you want.  You can call me an Asian Uncle Tom, but I applauded Kelly Marie Tran when she got the role but I just hated the way her character was written into the story - she had ZERO character development.  I don’t like the way Rey was written - She’s written as if she’s invincible.  Where the hell was her “Oh shit, I fucked up…moment.” She hasn’t had one.  Yeah, Luke had one…it was when he faced off against Darth Vader at Bespin minus a hand with the tip of that red lightsaber of Darth Vader’s aimed at his throat.  Holdo’s character was completely useless.  This was a complete fuck-up from start to finish.

But you guys are going to whine and cry that “Oh…he doesn’t like Kelly Marie Tran’s character; He’s RAAACIST…  Yeah, OK…whatever.  Kiss my ass.
